sentences.en: Egypt seemed to have established an unbroken line about five miles across theSuez Canal.
sentences.cn: 埃及似乎已经在苏伊士运河以东五英里处建立起一条连续不断的防线.

sentences.en: For example, an unbroken consecutive series of storage locations.
sentences.cn: 例如, 不间断的连续的一串存储单元.

sentences.en: He saw this solid green earth cover passing underneath for hours unbroken.
sentences.cn: 他看到这片郁郁葱葱的绿色地毯一连几小时在下面连绵不断.

sentences.en: He's too hot, like an unbroken horse.
sentences.cn: 他是霹雳火,是匹未驯服的烈马.

sentences.en: I consider that, in view of the Constitution and the laws, the Union is unbroken.
sentences.cn: 从宪法与法律上看, 我认为这一联合是不可分裂的.

sentences.en: In the North Sea all was unbroken cloud and rain.
sentences.cn: 北海上空满布乌云,而且下起雨来.

sentences.en: Not that the John Lewis tale has been an unbroken idyll.
sentences.cn: 约翰?刘易斯的故事并非毫无波澜的“田园诗”.

sentences.en: The ties of love towards hometown and relatives will always remain unbroken.
sentences.cn: 斩不断的是对故乡、亲人的情丝.

sentences.en: The voyage of their life have been one of unbroken smoothness.
sentences.cn: 他们的人生旅程一直一帆风顺.

sentences.en: There has been an unbroken chain of great violinists in the family.
sentences.cn: 这个家族每一代都有伟大的小提琴家.

sentences.en: We've had ten days of almost unbroken sunshine.
sentences.cn: 我们这儿连续10天差不多都是阳光明媚。

sentences.en: Whatever may be the changes produced by man, the eternal round at the seasons is unbroken.
sentences.cn: 不论是什么,人都可以使之改变, 但一年四季是永恒的,是改变不了的.

sentences.en: You can enjoy the extraordinary sight of unBroken cloud plains.
sentences.cn: 你可以欣赏那连绵不断的云海的非凡景象.

sentences.en: You can enjoy the extraordinary sight unbroken cloud plains that stretch out before you.
sentences.cn: 你可以欣赏展现于面前一望无边的奇特云海.

trans.tran_cn: 未破损的，连续的，（土地）未破土的，（马等）未驯服的
trans.tran_en: continuing without being interrupted or broken
